name: lutilsjs
description: A Loitd (youtube.com/tranducloi) Utilities Library for JavaScripts

scripts.pub: minify ./src/index.js --out-file ./index.min.js --mangle.keepClassName && git add * && git commit -am 'x' && git push origin master & npm publish

author: Tran Duc Loi (youtube.com/tranducloi)
